description.en: The course is aimed to assist students in developing an understanding of the principles of academic research and writing. Within this course, we also examine the writing and formatting guidelines for master's thesis. By way of combining lectures and practical assignments, the course is supposed to lay the foundations for the development of skills needed to carry out theoretically sound and practically meaningful independent academic research.
description.et: Aine käigus jagatakse teadmisi akadeemilise uurimistöö, ennekõike magistritöö kirjutamise ja vormistamise nõuete kohta. Loengute ja praktiliste ülesannete tulemusel omandatud oskused loovad tugevamad eeldused nii õigusteoreetilist kui ka praktilist väärtust eviva akadeemilise uurimistöö iseseisvaks läbiviimiseks.

objectives.en: To develop research skills and assist students in writing master's thesis in accordance with the School of Law's requirements.
objectives.et: Arendada uurimisoskusi ja toetada magistritöö kirjutamist kooskõlas õigusteaduskonnas kehtivate nõuetega.

learning_outcomes.en: In the end of the course participant is able to:
-	understand the principles of academic research;
-	comprehend the fundamental notions, concepts and best practices of legal writing;
learning_outcomes.et: -	tunneb õigusalase kirjutamise põhimõtteid ja head tava;

learning_outcomes.en: -	follow the writing and formatting guidelines for master's thesis;
learning_outcomes.et: -	järgib magistritöö vormistamise ja kirjutamise nõudeid;

learning_outcomes.en: -	orientate in main sources of academic research;
-	explain the principles of research ethics.
learning_outcomes.et: -	oskab seletada akadeemilise uurimise eetilisi aluseid.

grade_preconditions.et:
Pass/Fail
For passing the course a student is expected to:
*	Participate in and prepare for the meetings.
*	Timely complete the assignments as well as reviews and receive positive evaluation.
*	Timely submit a presentation on the basis of master's thesis, present it in the class and receive positive evaluation of the presentation.
*	Timely submit a review of the presentation and present it in the class.
